birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝湖北省黄州府黄安县
birth_place.en: Huang'an County, Huangzhou Prefecture, Hubei Province, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人和第一代主要领导人之一，中华人民共和国开国元勋，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、代主席、中共中央政治局常委，是“延安五老”之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party founder and one of its first-generation principal leaders, a founding father of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice President and Acting President of the PRC, and a Standing Committee member of the Politburo. He was one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an'.

description.zh-cn: 董必武的第三任妻子，一位参加了长征的女红军。
description.en: The third wife of Dong Biwu, a female Red Army soldier who participated in the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 董必武和何连芝的幼子。文化大革命期间是一名红卫兵领导人，曾两次遭到逮捕。
description.en: The youngest son of Dong Biwu and He Lianzhi. He was a Red Guard leader during the Cultural Revolution and was arrested twice.

description.zh-cn: 日本的一所私立大学，董必武曾在此学习法律并毕业。
description.en: A private university in Japan where Dong Biwu studied law and graduated.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪20年代在苏联莫斯科创办的大学，为国共两党培养了许多干部，董必武曾在此学习。
description.en: A university founded in Moscow, Soviet Union in the 1920s, which trained many cadres for both the KMT and the CCP. Dong Biwu studied here.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际在莫斯科创办的培训各国共产党干部的学校，董必武曾在此学习。
description.en: A school established by the Comintern in Moscow to train cadres from communist parties around the world. Dong Biwu studied here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。董必武是其创始人之一。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Dong Biwu was one of its founders.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的国际组织。董必武作为中国共产党解放区代表参加了其在旧金山的制宪会议，是创始人之一。
description.en: An international organization composed of sovereign states. Dong Biwu, as a representative of the Liberated Areas of the Communist Party of China, participated in its founding conference in San Francisco and is considered one of its founders.

description.zh-cn: 1935年发生在陕甘革命根据地的一场肃反运动。中共中央到达陕北后，成立了由董必武负责的五人党务委员会，负责调查并纠正了此次肃反中的错误。
description.en: A purge campaign that took place in the Shaan-Gan Revolutionary Base in 1935. After the CPC Central Committee arrived in northern Shaanxi, a five-member Party Affairs Committee headed by Dong Biwu was established to investigate and correct the mistakes made during this purge.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕甘边区革命根据地的主要创建者之一。在1935年陕北肃反中被错误关押，后由董必武等人组成的中央党务委员会释放。
description.en: A high-ranking commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army and one of the main founders of the Shaan-Gan Revolutionary Base. He was wrongly imprisoned during the 1935 Shaanbei Purge and later released by the Central Party Affairs Committee, which included Dong Biwu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央政法小组组长。1958年，他领导的中央政法小组指令召开第四届全国司法工作会议，实际上对董必武的司法路线进行了不点名批判。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the head of the Central Political and Legal Group. In 1958, the group under his leadership directed the convening of the Fourth National Judicial Work Conference, which effectively criticized Dong Biwu's judicial line without naming him.

description.zh-cn: 1958年成立的中共中央议事协调机构，负责领导政法工作，首任组长为彭真。
description.en: A coordinating body of the CPC Central Committee established in 1958 to lead political and legal affairs, with Peng Zhen as its first head.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。期间，国家主席刘少奇被打倒，董必武的幼子董良翮被捕，董必武本人则成为代理国家主席。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China. During this period, State President Liu Shaoqi was overthrown, Dong Biwu's youngest son Dong Lianghe was arrested, and Dong Biwu himself became the acting president.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命中被打倒和迫害致死。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, who was overthrown and persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 指中共中央副主席林彪等人被指企图发动政变失败后，乘机出走坠毁的事件。此事件后，身为国家副主席的董必武被宣布为中华人民共和国代主席。
description.en: Refers to the incident where Lin Biao, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, allegedly attempted a failed coup and died in a plane crash while fleeing. After this event, Dong Biwu, then Vice President, was declared Acting President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国主席存废之争

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席存废之争

description.zh-cn: 关于是否在中华人民共和国宪法中设立国家主席职务的政治争议，最终导致1975年宪法废除了该职务，董必武的代理主席任期也随之结束。
description.en: The political debate over whether to retain the post of President of the PRC in the constitution, which ultimately led to the abolition of the position in the 1975 Constitution, thus ending Dong Biwu's term as acting president.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的重要领导人之一，与董必武、徐特立、谢觉哉、吴玉章并称为“延安五老”。
description.en: One of the important leaders of the CPC and the PRC, known as one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an' along with Dong Biwu, Xu Teli, Xie Juezai, and Wu Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家和教育家，与董必武、林伯渠、谢觉哉、吴玉章并称为“延安五老”。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and educator, known as one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an' along with Dong Biwu, Lin Boqu, Xie Juezai, and Wu Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家和法学家，曾任中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长，与董必武、林伯渠、徐特立、吴玉章并称为“延安五老”。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and jurist who served as President of the Supreme People's Court of the PRC, known as one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an' along with Dong Biwu, Lin Boqu, Xu Teli, and Wu Yuzhang.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家和教育家，与董必武、林伯渠、徐特立、谢觉哉并称为“延安五老”。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and educator, known as one of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an' along with Dong Biwu, Lin Boqu, Xu Teli, and Xie Juezai.

description.zh-cn: 何连芝是董必武的第三任妻子。
description.en: He Lianzhi was Dong Biwu's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 董良翮是董必武的幼子。
description.en: Dong Lianghe is the youngest son of Dong Biwu.

degree.en: Graduated from the Faculty of Law

description.zh-cn: 1914年，董必武东渡日本学习法律，毕业于日本大学。
description.en: In 1914, Dong Biwu went to Japan to study law and graduated from Nihon University.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，董必武赴莫斯科中山大学学习。
description.en: In 1928, Dong Biwu went to Moscow Sun Yat-sen University to study.

description.zh-cn: 1928年，董必武赴莫斯科，在国际列宁学校学习。
description.en: In 1928, Dong Biwu went to Moscow and studied at the International Lenin School.

description.zh-cn: 董必武作为武汉小组代表，出席了中国共产党第一次全国代表大会，是党的创始人之一。
description.en: As a delegate from the Wuhan group, Dong Biwu attended the First National Congress of the Communist Party of China and was one of the party's founders.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，董必武作为中国共产党解放区代表参加旧金山联合国制宪会议，在《联合国宪章》上签字，是联合国的创始人之一。
description.en: In 1945, Dong Biwu, as a representative of the Liberated Areas of the Communist Party of China, participated in the United Nations Conference on International Organization in San Francisco, signed the UN Charter, and is considered one of the founders of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 长征到达陕北后，董必武担任中央党务委员会主任，负责调查并纠正了陕北肃反中的错误，释放了刘志丹、高岗、习仲勋等干部。
description.en: After the Long March reached northern Shaanxi, Dong Biwu served as the director of the Central Party Affairs Committee, responsible for investigating and correcting the errors of the Shaanbei Purge, and released cadres such as Liu Zhidan, Gao Gang, and Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 董必武担任中央党务委员会主任，负责调查陕北肃反，并于1935年11月7日宣布释放包括刘志丹在内的18名陕甘苏区干部。
description.en: As director of the Central Party Affairs Committee, Dong Biwu was responsible for investigating the Shaanbei Purge and announced the release of 18 cadres from the Shaan-Gan Soviet Area, including Liu Zhidan, on November 7, 1935.

description.zh-cn: 1958年，中央政法小组组长彭真指令召开第四届全国司法工作会议，对董必武的司法路线进行了不点名批判。
description.en: In 1958, Peng Zhen, head of the Central Political and Legal Group, directed the convening of the Fourth National Judicial Work Conference, which conducted an unnamed criticism of Dong Biwu's judicial line.

description.zh-cn: 1958年中央政法小组成立时，董必武为成员之一，组长为彭真。
description.en: When the Central Political and Legal Group was established in 1958, Dong Biwu was a member, while Peng Zhen was the head.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，时任中华人民共和国主席的刘少奇被打倒。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Shaoqi, then President of the People's Republic of China, was overthrown.

description.zh-cn: 林彪事件后，身为国家副主席的董必武被宣布为中华人民共和国代主席，填补了权力真空。
description.en: After the Lin Biao Incident, Dong Biwu, then Vice President, was declared Acting President of the People's Republic of China, filling the power vacuum.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，董必武的幼子、红卫兵领导人董良翮曾两次遭到逮捕。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Dong Biwu's youngest son, Dong Lianghe, a Red Guard leader, was arrested twice.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国主席存废之争

description.zh-cn: 1975年1月，第四届全国人民代表大会通过新宪法，正式废除国家主席和副主席职务，董必武的代理主席任期随之结束。
description.en: In January 1975, the Fourth National People's Congress passed a new constitution, officially abolishing the posts of President and Vice President, which ended Dong Biwu's term as acting president.

description.zh-cn: 董必武与林伯渠、徐特立、谢觉哉、吴玉章在延安被尊称为“延安五老”。
description.en: In Yan'an, Dong Biwu, along with Lin Boqu, Xu Teli, Xie Juezai, and Wu Yuzhang, were respectfully referred to as the 'Five Elders of Yan'an'.

description.zh-cn: 董必武与林伯渠、徐特立、谢觉哉、吴玉章在延安被尊称为“延安五老”。
description.en: In Yan'an, Dong Biwu, along with Lin Boqu, Xu Teli, Xie Juezai, and Wu Yuzhang, were respectfully referred to as the 'Five Elders of Yan'an'.

description.zh-cn: 董必武与林伯渠、徐特立、谢觉哉、吴玉章在延安被尊称为“延安五老”。
description.en: In Yan'an, Dong Biwu, along with Lin Boqu, Xu Teli, Xie Juezai, and Wu Yuzhang, were respectfully referred to as the 'Five Elders of Yan'an'.

description.en: In Yan'an, Dong Biwu, along with Lin Boqu, Xu Teli, Xie Juezai, and Wu Yuzhang, were respectfully referred to as the 'Five Elders of Yan'an'.
